If you don't have a paid Microsoft 365 or Microsoft Entra subscription, you need to activate a free [Microsoft Entra Account](https://azure.microsoft.com/free/) or establish a paid subscription. All Azure subscriptions, whether paid or free, have a trust relationship with a Microsoft Entra tenant. All subscriptions rely on the Microsoft Entra tenant (directory) to authenticate and authorize security principals and devices. \n+ To access the Microsoft Entra admin center or the Azure portal, each user needs permissions with a valid subscription. ai_summary.Response: The commit updates links to Azure free account sign-up pages across multiple documentation files. The change replaces older free account URLs with newer, more specific pricing and purchase options links. This update aims to provide users with the most current and relevant information when they need to create a new Azure tenant or account for testing and development purposes.
